page.title: 13Rowhedge Now By Sam Baker
page.content: The Colne is the river that runs in between Rowhedge & Wivenhoe, there are three main ports along the river Wivenhoe, Rowhedge, and Colchester so the river is quite busy with ships, the river is also used for pleasure, there a quite a lot of sailing boats and a few dinghgs. In Rowhedge there is not a lot of things for children to play so we have to think of our own games we can go fishing, sailing, play football go over the sand pits on bikes and on hot days go swimming in the river. At one time there were plans to build a bridge acros the river which meant that even more lories would go through Rowhedge but luckely the plan was stopped.
